timeline.bodyText: Perhaps I'm missing something but I don't see the point of this class?
timeline.author: jmcphers
timeline.diffHunk:

+public class SuppressNextShellFocusEvent extends GwtEvent<SuppressNextShellFocusEvent.Handler>
+{
+   public static class Data extends JavaScriptObject

replies.bodyText: Sorry, it's unneeded -- it was just leftover boilerplate from the generated template I had.
replies.author: kevinushey
